answers.answer: I am too diabetic but my levels are not that high I am on insulin injection....but still I have many complication such as my baby diagnosed with heart pblm and many other issue with delivery I am scared like hell....don't know what to do just waiting for days to pass by fast
I know I'm so scared I'm going to kill or hurt her. I'm 20 weeks and my next appointment they are checking her heart and things. So scared.....

question: Anyone with diabetes and pregnant.?. So I'm on the pump and latter this after noon I realized my sugar was staying elevated. (260) Now I check it it's 396 and this is as high as it's ever been sense being pregnant I'm flipping out because I don't want it to hurt my baby but my bf is saying it's OK cause this is the first time ever being this high. Advice?  I'm nervous and scared.  :(
title: diabetes and pregnancy.!!!
